summary: A group of starving artists try to survive in 1830s Paris, including a seamstress and the would-be playwright she loves.
cast: Lillian Gish|John Gilbert|Renée Adorée|George Hassell|Roy D'Arcy|Edward Everett Horton|Karl Dane|Mathilde Comont|Gino Corrado|Eugene Pouyet|Frank Currier|David Mir|Catherine Vidor|Valentina Zimina|Agostino Borgato|Harry Crocker|Blanche Payson
title: Vida bohemia
